subject_labels: Use CDK v2 with TypeScript - no JavaScript or other languages allowed
All EC2 instances must use Amazon Linux 2023 AMI
Instance type must be t3.micro for cost optimization
No SSH keys or key pairs - access only via Session Manager
VPC Flow Logs must capture ALL traffic (accepted and rejected)
Each subnet must have explicit route table associations
Security groups must follow least privilege principle with no 0.0.0.0/0 inbound rules
All resources must be created in a single CDK stack
Use CDK L2 constructs where available, avoid L1 constructs
NAT Gateways must have Elastic IPs with deletion protection enabled
author: mayanksethi-turing
